name: Advent of Code
text: Solving the very entertaining and educating puzzels of this most fun coding adventure. In multiple languages, e.g., Python, C#, Rust, C, C++, JavaScript, Go...

name: Integrated Circuits Logic
text: In the process of learning how compueters work at a logic level, I've been trying some ICs (Integrated Circuits) to test their behavior.

name: Electronics Schematic & PCB Design
text: Going further in the world of electronics, trying electronic schematics and PCB (Printed Circuit Board) design in EasyEDA.

name: Breadboard Prototyping
text: In the beginning there is the breadboard prototyping.

name: Hello Languages
text: Trying out and comparing multiple programming languages.

name: Tic-Tac-Toe
text: Implementing Tic-Tac-Toe Game in multiple platforms, runtimes and programing languages.

name: Xamarin.Forms.OAuth
text: A <url link="http://www.nuget.org/" text="Nuget"></url> package that provides authentication for <url link="https://developer.xamarin.com/guides/xamarin-forms/" text="Xamarin Forms"></url> applications against a long list of <url link="http://oauth.net/" text="OAuth"></url> Identity Providers.

name: 2048.net
text: An implementation of <url link="http://2048game.com/" text="2048"></url> game in <url link="https://developer.xamarin.com/guides/xamarin-forms/" text="Xamarin Forms"></url> that runs (almost) everywhere (Windows 10, Windows 10 IoT in Raspberry Pi, iOS, Android, Windows 10 Mobile)

name: NetCore
text: A tutorial on how to create .Net Core console and web applications from scratch in and that run on Windows (10), Linux (Debian) and Mac OS X (10.11 El Capitan).

name: Summing Matrices
text: Solving an old mathematical problem in a computer program implemented in various programming languages.

name: Website Boilerplate
text: An exploration on <url href="http://requirejs.org/">RequireJS</url>, <url href="https://github.com/systemjs/systemjs">SystemJS</url>, <url href="https://angularjs.org/">AngularJS</url>, <url href="https://github.com/angular-ui/ui-router">AngularUI Router</url>, <url href="https://codemirror.net/">CodeMirror</url>, <url href="https://highlightjs.org/">highlight.js</url> and <url href="http://prismjs.com/">Prism</url>.

name: Tower of Bab-IL
text: Work in Progress - A dive into the low-level .Net: programming languages, compilers, CIL, references, limitations and incompatibilities.

name: Jazz Standards Web Rendering
text: Dynamically rendering jazz standards stored as <url href="https://www.musicxml.com/">musicXML</url> using <url href="https://github.com/0xfe/vexflow">VexFlow</url>.

name: Music Notation Standardization
text: It took me sometime but I, finally, got to join the software developer and the "musician" sides of me and started participating in the creation of the all new music notation standards.

name: Generic OData
text: A generic and schemaless OData Web API controller.

name: Generic Presenter
text: A web-based presenter that, through simple configuration, allows for slide-based presentations in two screens with notes.
